metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rundll32.exe')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('shellexec_rundll')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('powershell')))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
